sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the African American Employment Plan Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the African American Employment Plan Act.

sections.heading: Purposes. The purposes of this Act are as follows:
sections.text: Purposes. The purposes of this Act are as follows:

sections.heading: State agency affirmative action and equal employment opportunity goals.
sections.text: State agency affirmative action and equal employment opportunity goals.

sections.heading: African American Employment Plan Advisory Council.
sections.text: African American Employment Plan Advisory Council.

sections.heading: Collective bargaining agreements.   The rights of employees covered by a collective bargaining agreement shall not be affected by this Act.
sections.text: Collective bargaining agreements. The rights of employees covered by a collective bargaining agreement shall not be affected by this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
